titleStmt.title: A. L. Waggoner et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG4181

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p: To his Excellency the Governor of Kentucky.

The undersigned citizens of Marshall County would represent that at the June term 1863 of the Circuit Court of this County, T. J. Strow was tried upon an indictment charging him with malicious stabbing & fined Sixty two 50/100 Dollars: that at the time of the finding of this indictment another indictment against him for malicious stabbing was found & presented upon ^which^ latter he has heretofore been tried & was fined Five Hundred Dollars which with fees & costs has been settled; that the two offenses charged were committed at the same time & place and in the same difficulty; that said Strow was laboring under great excitement at the time; that this stabbing was done in 1858; that he has not since been engaged in any fights or any such difficulties. In consideration of all which & of his having incurred & paid large costs & expenses in these cases, we would ask that said Sixtytwo 50/100 Dollar fine saving offices fees & costs be remitted
Sept. 16, 1863.

A L Waggoner
H. Hamilton
A. K Lindsey
Wm Hamilton
G Washburn
H Johnston
J. C. Gilbert
P. Palmer
A A Nelson
Jos G Lumisl
J W Dyers
J. T. Pack
J T Slone
Absalom Smith
E. H. Pace
D. D. Thompson
J. M. Malcom
J. T. Clark
John W. Myers
J. M. Stephens
T. E. Barnes
B. Holland
J. B. Gilbert
John Hetzler
J. H Riley
W. B. Eley
G. S. Jones
W. A. Holland
R F Letcher
H. B. Williams
J.
J. W. Pierson
F M Pool
J. K. Nelson
E. C. Hunter
J. L. Burd
J. A. Hunter
M. C. Rowland
J. E. Ford
N. D. Hunter
J. T. Walpol
Wm. Myers
Joseph Myers
L. R. Finley --
J. H. Burd
Remit all except costs & fees Oct 7th 1863

Marshall Cir Ct
vs
T. J. Strow
Stabbing
$62.50
remitted 7th Oct/ 63
